name: Steel Coffin
description:
Built for Ludum Dare 49 - Theme : "Unstable"

In these resource management game, you play as a mechanic tasked with maintaining a mech used for space exploration. Be mindful of the available resources and survive as long as you can.

**How to play**

Parts of the mech get damaged during its sorties. These parts are highlighted in Orange. Click on them to repair them. This will consume resources.

An orange part gets hit a second time -> Game Over

You leave the base with not enough fuel in the tank -> Game Over

This game was built in less than 10 hours, and was designed as more of an interactive story than a full-fledged game. 

Thanks for playing !
